entry.title: Dynabrade 93166 - 4 Inch Spindle Mount 80 Grit Aluminum Oxide Sanding Star
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Spindle mount
Price: 35.84

[shortdesc]
  • 4 Inch (102 mm) Dia
  • 80 Grit A/O Spindle-Mount Sanding Star
  • Premium aluminum oxide abrasive resin bonded to a flexibe cloth backing provides consintuous cutting action without gouging.
  • A good choice for denibbing and sanding white wood raised panels , sanding carvings ad other comples shapes without chaging the shape detail
  • Also used for metal deburring and polishing, ID and OD cleaning and of metal surfaces
  • The grain, bond and backing wear away together during use, continuously exposing sharp fresh abrasives for long usefule life whil generating a consistent
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Dynabrade
    Diameter 4 Inch
    Grit 80
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Spindle mount

entry.title: Dynabrade 93541 - 1-1/2 Inch Eyelet Mount 80 Grit Aluminum Oxide Sanding Star
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Eyelet mount
Price: 11.54

[shortdesc]
  • 1-1/2 Inch (38 mm) Dia
  • 80 Grit A/O Eyelet Sanding Star
  • The most common mineral used in a wide range of good, general purpose abrasive products for use primarily on softer materials
  • It lacks the hardness of some other abrasive minerals but delivers a dependable performance where high pressure/high heat applies
  • Denibbing and sanding white wood raised panels.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Dynabrade
    Diameter 1-1/2 Inch
    Grit 80
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Eyelet mount
    Set Quantity 10
